articles.title: Classroom gap widens as school year begins
articles.description: WITH 27 million students trooping to schools on Monday, the Department of Education (DepEd) continues to face the same old problems it has for so many years, but Education Secretary Sonny Angara acknowledged that it's going to be tough this year as the shortage of classrooms has swelled to 160,000.

articles.title: Fallout Shelter has been downloaded over 230 million times in 10 years
articles.description: On the tenth anniversary of the release of free-to-play Fallout Shelter, Bethesda has revealed the management sim game …
articles.content:
On the tenth anniversary of the release of free-to-play Fallout Shelter, Bethesda has revealed the management sim game has been downloaded 230 million times across all platforms.

articles.title: HostColor Expands Its AMD Dedicated Server Offerings in LA and New York
articles.content:
HostColor.com (HC) has announced the immediate availability of bare metal servers powered by AMD Ryzen and AMD EPYC processors in several new data center locations in Los Angeles and New York City.

articles.title: Speaker Emerita Melissa Hortman, husband shot and killed; Sen. John Hoffman and wife also shot
articles.description: Speaker Emerita Melissa Hortman and her husband have died after they were shot at their home in Brooklyn Park.
articles.content:
Democratic House Speaker Emerita Melissa Hortman and her husband, Mark, were shot and killed Saturday morning at their home in Brooklyn Park in what Gov. Tim Walz called a “politically motivated assassination.”

articles.title: Minnesota politician and husband shot dead in 'politically motivated assassination' - second politician and wife wounded
articles.description: A manhunt is underway for the suspect - who was reportedly posing as a police officer.
articles.content:
A manhunt is underway after a US politician and her husband were shot and killed in their home in a "politically motivated assassination" - and another politician and his wife were also shot.

articles.title: Alas Pilipinas yields to dominant Vietnam, settles for silver in AVC Nations Cup
articles.description: MANILA, Philippines — Alas Pilipinas simply could not keep up with the taller, faster, and more experienced Vietnam team in the final, 15-25, 17-25, 14-25, to settle for a silver medal in the AVC Women's Nations Cup at the Dong Anh Arena on Saturday night.
